directions: In a medium bowl, beat cream cheese until fluffy. Mix in salad dressing and 2 tablespoons reserved pineapple juice.  Stir in the pineapple tidbits, chicken, almonds, and grapes until evenly coated. Chill until serving.
ingredients: ⅓ cup creamy salad dressing, e.g. Miracle Whip ™
1 (8 ounce) can pineapple tidbits, juice reserved
title: Hawaiian Chicken Salad
